name: Scarab
overview: The wicked priest of the great pharoah Amenhotep the third has put a spell on you and turned you info a scarab. Your only chance is to find the way to the sun. You must get out of the pyramid with its mean and savage creatures, its deadly traps and and all its many secrets. There is only one way to escape... Find the key for the secret door in the west hall and place it on the podium in the pool room. Secret keys and signs will guide your way. Only with wisdom, skill and judgement will you be able to return to your former life. It will be tough, there are 20 chambers to explore and only 3 lives to do it with.
